Modern practice platform for 42 students

What is Mithril?

Mithril is a next-generation terminal-based practice environment designed specifically for 42 school students.

‚ú® Key Features

üöÄ Quick Start 

# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/mithril.git

# Navigate to project
cd mithril

# Install dependencies
make install

# Run the application
./mithril
